title: Why is Indian music decreasing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Indian music has its great tradition.It is propagated for elevation of mind, body and environment of every human and all existing creature On this plenet.This very music has been for service and blessedness.It's aim are to give other the supreme please and infinite anand ,but it has now lossed its aim.Todays music has only it's aim to fulfill ones worldly Pleasure .It has not been the sourse of attainig God or ideal purpuse to give other mental amusement. Although today's music has all its glimpse,resorses,modern technical assistance,acceptence and support but even then it is fail to fulfill its real moto.In my view today's music is Only based on swar ,lay,and word,Chand, creativity, showcase things.It has lossed the real spirital expression and supreme elevative emotional touch.thats why it has started from dhrupad,dhamar,thumrir,tappa,khayal and now gradually much more surfacial music . Every one have to stablised this super music to its real place to promote it's real position by which again this special music will be more effective ,more emencive, more expressive more elevative more authenticative ,more progressive.
